DOC.brief_summary: This prospective longitudinal study compare incidence rate Medicare beneficiary surgical minimally invasive intervention post index procedure , well harm associate MILD procedure , 24 month post-treatment MILD , test control group similar patient comparable procedure .
DOC.brief_title: MILD® Percutaneous Image-Guided Lumbar Decompression : A Medicare Claims Study
DOC.detailed_description: Using Centers Medicare Medicaid ( CMS ) Medicare Research Identifiable Files ( RIFs ) contain medical claim 100 % Medicare beneficiary enrol Medicare fee-for-service program , claims-based patient history demographic combine longitudinal analysis . In study , control group include patient receive interspinous process decompression ( IPD ) treatment lumbar spinal stenosis ( LSS ) neurogenic claudication ( NC ) . The treatment group include patient receive MILD enrollment period . The date MILD IPD procedure serve index procedure date 24-month follow-up . This study exempt IRB oversight ( Department Health Human Services regulation 45 CFR 46 ) .
DOC.criteria: Medicare beneficiary receive MILD interspinous process decompression Diagnosis LSS NC ≥66 year old Patients receive laminectomy , laminotomy , fusion , interspinous process decompression , MILD lumbar region 12 month prior index date
